name: Raise3D Pro3 0.4 nozzle (Left)
machine_start_gcode:
;Bounding Box: {digits(first_layer_print_min[0],0,2)} {if(first_layer_print_max[0]>300)}{300}{else}{digits(first_layer_print_max[0],0,2)}{endif} {digits(first_layer_print_min[1],0,2)} {if(first_layer_print_max[1]>300)}{300}{else}{digits(first_layer_print_max[1],0,2)}{endif}

M104 T0 S{nozzle_temperature_initial_layer[0] - 20} ; raise left extruder temp
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; raise bed temp
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; wait for bed temp
M109 T0 S{nozzle_temperature_initial_layer[0] - 20} ; wait for left extruder temp
M104 T0 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; set left extruder temp
M109 T0 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; wait for left extruder temp
T0
G21
G90
M82
M107
M106 P2 S0
G1 Z0.3 F500
G92 E0
G1 Z0.3 F400
G1 X100 Y{random(2,8)} F1000
G1 X170 Y{random(2,8)} E15 F200
G1 Z5 E15 F200
G92 E0
G1 Z10 F2000 ; move up from purge line
G1 Y30 F2000 ; move away from purge line
G1 X{(first_layer_print_max[0] + first_layer_print_min[0])/2} Y{(first_layer_print_max[1] + first_layer_print_min[1])/2} Z{initial_layer_print_height} ; move to center of print
M117 Printing...
M1001
